translation.en: I thought they took care of that.
What, student body president isn't enough for you?
translation.fr:
Présidente du conseil ne te suffit pas ?
T'es pionne maintenant ?

translation.en: -Now you're hall monitor, too, Cassandra? -We're on in a minute, Harry.
translation.fr:
Présidente du conseil ne te suffit pas ?
T'es pionne maintenant ? Ça va être à nous, Harry.

translation.en: -Hmm. -Eighty-five in a row. Beating the record.
[Cassandra] A new record. Is that as far as you're prepared to go?
translation.fr: Un nouveau record. Prêt à continuer ?

translation.en: -You spun them yourself. -Not a flicker of doubt?
translation.fr:
- Vous les avez lancés ?
- Sans aucun doute.

translation.en: I could never ever do that.
translation.fr: Je ne pourrais jamais faire ça.

translation.en: Ooh. Re-gifted flowers for the assistant stage manager?
translation.fr:
Des fleurs recyclées
pour la régisseuse adjointe ?

translation.en: The best stage manager in the whole world. -Thank you. -[chuckles]
translation.fr:
- La meilleure régisseuse au monde.
- Merci.
Will a bien joué ce soir.

translation.en: [whispers] You should tell him how you feel.
Okay, but don't be late. Guys?
translation.fr: Sois pas en retard. Les mecs ?

translation.en: You need us to bring anything tonight, dude?
Hey, bring some vodka tonight. It's BYOB.
translation.fr: Amène de la vodka ou ce que tu veux boire.

translation.en: So nice of you to invite everyone.
translation.fr: C'est sympa d'inviter tout le monde.

translation.en: Is that really the point, Harry?
It's not for the play. It's for people who are helping out with prom.
translation.fr: C'est pour le bal de promo, pas la pièce.

translation.en: But if you want to come...
It's okay. I'll see you tomorrow.
Oh, by the way, Cassandra, you were really, really great tonight.
translation.fr: Cassandra, tu as super bien joué ce soir.

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you so much when you go up to Yale.
translation.fr: Tu vas me manquer quand tu seras à Yale.

translation.en: I was in a play. [man] Play?
translation.fr:
- Je jouais dans une pièce.
- Une pièce ?

translation.en: Yeah, you know, on a stage, in an auditorium. For people to come and see.
translation.fr:
Oui, sur scène, dans un auditorium.
Devant un public.

translation.en: Did you see this week's check yet? It was supposed to be here today.
translation.fr:
T'as vu le chèque des allocs ?
Il devait arriver aujourd'hui.

translation.en: Might be a state budget thing, you know.
translation.fr: Y a peut-être des coupures budgétaires.

translation.en: I'm not the goddamn Red Cross.
-[Harry] Hey. -You can't go in there now, Harry.
What are you two doing here? You need something?
Okay, I have a town meeting in 20 minutes. I'll see you at home after?
translation.fr:
J'ai réunion dans 20 minutes.
On se voit à la maison ?

translation.en: All we know is, there was a smell, it went away, and now it's back.
translation.fr:
Il y avait une odeur.
Elle est partie, puis revenue.

translation.en: The committee of selectmen have asked the federal government for help.
translation.fr:
Le comité a demandé
l'aide du gouvernement.

translation.en: The EPA and the Department of the Interior will begin testing this week.
translation.fr:
Ils commenceront à faire des tests
cette semaine.

translation.en: there's no reason to suspect that this stink poses any health hazard.
translation.fr:
rien ne laisse supposer
que cette odeur est dangereuse.

translation.en: But if anyone wants to use this as a cue to get out of Dodge for the week, personal choice.
translation.fr:
Servez-vous de cette excuse
pour quitter la ville si vous voulez.

translation.en: And, of course, our senior high school, kids over the age of 16 are going to be the guest of the National Park Service
translation.fr:
Les élèves de terminale de plus de 16 ans
sont invités par les parcs nationaux.

translation.en: who will bus them to the Great Smoky Mountains for a week's camping.
translation.fr:
Ils iront en bus jusqu'aux montagnes
Great Smoky pour camper.

translation.en: All right, last one for a week. We don't wanna start a forest fire.
translation.fr:
Le dernier avant une semaine.
Faut pas mettre le feu.

translation.en: -[boy] Graffiti. -Yeah, I know it's graffiti, man,
translation.fr: Des graffitis. Oui, je le vois bien,

translation.en: but when was the last time you guys saw graffiti in this town?
translation.fr: mais ça fait un bail qu'on n'en a pas vu.

translation.en: It's the writing on the wall.
-[boy] Yeah, no duh. -That's what it's called.
translation.fr:
- On le voit.
- C'est ce qu'on dit.

translation.en: "The writing on the wall"? From the Bible, the Book of Daniel.
translation.fr:
"L'écriture a été tracée".
Dans la Bible. Le Livre de Daniel.

translation.en: -Mene Mene Tekel Upharsin. -Why do you always know shit I don't know?
translation.fr:
- Mene Mene Tekel Upharsin.
- D'où tu sors ça ?

translation.en: It means, "You've been weighed in the balance and found wanting."
translation.fr:
"Tu as été pesé,
et tu ne fais pas le poids."

translation.en: someone was definitely fucking high last night.
translation.fr: que quelqu'un était défoncé hier soir.

translation.en: [in sign language] Dad wanted to make sure we brought our toothbrushes, did you...
translation.fr:
Papa veut savoir
si t'as pas oublié ta brosse à dents.

translation.en: -It's just a shirt. -Half a shirt. And not for school.
translation.fr:
- C'est un chemisier.
- Une moitié. Pas pour l'école.

translation.en: -You have no idea. -Of course I do. I have a mother.
translation.fr:
- Tu peux pas savoir.
- Si. J'ai une mère.

translation.en: -Um, okay, I'm gonna-- -All right, have fun.
Do you mind if I, uh, sit here?
-[groans] -[man] Change of plans. Rock slides, the road is closed. You're back home.
translation.fr:
Changement de programme.
Éboulis. Route fermée. Retour chez vous.

translation.en: doesn't look like anyone was expecting us.
translation.fr: On dirait que personne ne nous attendait.

translation.en: My mom's phone, it just keeps ringing.
-You're not going to wait for me? -[Campbell chuckles]
Can I crash with you tonight? It's too far back to my place.
translation.fr:
Je peux dormir chez toi ?
J'habite trop loin.

translation.en: Mom, I'm back home. They-- They brought us back.
translation.fr: Je suis revenue. On a fait demi-tour.

translation.en: -My mom must've left town with my sister. -Same here.
translation.fr:
- Ma mère a dû partir avec ma sœur.
- Pareil.

translation.en: But their cars are still in the driveway. It's fucking weird.
translation.fr: Leurs voitures sont là, c'est zarbe.

translation.en: Fuck. I don't think I have any data.
And the storm must have knocked out our data.
translation.fr: L'orage a dû bousiller le réseau.

translation.en: Hey, so who decided that we needed a flash mob?
translation.fr: Qui a demandé un flash mob ?

translation.en: Has anyone been able to reach anyone?
And there was a miscommunication, and we were brought back here by mistake.
translation.fr:
Il y a eu un malentendu,
et on nous a ramenés par erreur.

translation.en: Someone would still answer a phone.
I don't know, maybe there's some place with no reception.
translation.fr:
Ou ils n'ont pas de réseau
où ils se trouvent.

translation.en: In the morning, someone will answer a phone.
Maybe it's not safe for us to be here, if they all left.
translation.fr:
C'est peut-être dangereux de rester ici
s'ils sont partis.

translation.en: A couple hours isn't gonna make a difference.
translation.fr: Deux heures, ça ne changera rien.

translation.en: We'll figure this all out in the morning.
Yeah, we should go home. And anyone who doesn't want to...
translation.fr: On devrait rentrer. Si vous n'avez pas envie...

translation.en: uh, be alone can come back to our house. Yeah?
translation.fr: de rester seuls, venez chez nous.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, Harry, yeah. Just go to sleep.
No, I don't care what Cassandra says.
translation.fr: Je me fiche de ce qu'elle a dit.

translation.en: I-- Yeah, no, I get that, Gwen,
and maybe your mom and dad would do something like this,
but my mom doesn't leave her house unless you drag her out by her hair and...
translation.fr:
mais ma mère ne sort pas de chez elle
à moins qu'on la traîne de force...

translation.en: -[sighs] And even then, she-- -You're being paranoid, Lex.
Your mom left because of the smell, like Cassandra said.
translation.fr: C'est à cause de l'odeur. Cassandra l'a dit.

translation.en: It's the only thing that makes sense.
So, let's just forget about it tonight. -Come hang with us. -[Lexie] No!
translation.fr:
Arrêtons d'y penser pour ce soir.
Viens avec nous.

translation.en: No, no, I'm not gonna go to some party, all right? You go.
translation.fr: Je ne compte pas faire la fête. Vas-y.

translation.en: I got to go take a pee.
The whole place is open, man. Just go right here.
Who's gonna remember in the morning?
Shut the fuck up. Can you fucking leave?
translation.fr:
Ta gueule. - Tire-toi.
- C'est juste une amie.

translation.en: -[Harry] She's just my friend. -[girl] Um, I would, but--
translation.fr:
- Tire-toi.
- C'est juste une amie. Si je veux...

translation.en: Hey, Kel. I can explain everything. Kel!
[in sign language] I can't sign and shoot.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas filmer et répondre.

translation.en: Why don't you ever join in?
Hey, why are you spoiling all the fun?
Is it like a ballerina thing?
Apart from the fact that you were drying her tits?
I didn't mean anything by it.
You don't mean anything by anything.
I was just trying to have a little bit of fun.
I mean, it's not like we own each other.
No. I mean, you know what I mean.
She doesn't really believe in this kind of thing, you know?
translation.fr: Elle ne croit pas en tout ça.

translation.en: It's always a lot less fun than you think it's gonna be. Isn't it?
translation.fr:
C'est toujours moins fun
qu'on se l'imagine. Non ?

translation.en: I have a confession to make.
Well, this isn't a Catholic Church. [laughs]
You can't just do that, you know?
translation.fr: On ne peut pas faire ça.
Je retire ce que j'ai dit.

translation.en: Once it was so cold, my pee froze on the way down.
translation.fr:
Une fois,
il faisait si froid que ma pisse gelait.

translation.en: Oh, I wish I'd been there.
[Grizz] The writing on the wall, it's gone.
Yeah, of course it is. They cleaned it up.
We're completely cut off from the world.
translation.fr: On est complètement coupés du monde.

translation.en: There's no cable Wi-Fi. Go check your modem.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a pas de Wi-Fi.
Regarde ton modem.

translation.en: Try your parents' satellite TV. Nothing.
translation.fr:
La télé de tes parents par satellite.
Rien.

translation.en: And you really want to freak yourself out?
It's all fucked up. We can talk to each other, but...
translation.fr: C'est trop zarbe. On peut s'appeler...

translation.en: it's like there's nothing beyond this place.
translation.fr: mais il n'y a rien au-delà de cet endroit.

translation.en: I'll get a car and go to Greenwich to get help.
translation.fr: J'irai à Greenwich chercher de l'aide.

translation.en: Someone has to find out where everyone went.
translation.fr: Il faut savoir où ils sont passés.
On va pas tous y aller.

translation.en: Luke, you want to see if we can get some of the guys to come with?
translation.fr:
Tu peux demander aux mecs
s'ils veulent venir ?

translation.en: Okay, so as a rule, the more bizarre a thing seems,
translation.fr:
En général,
plus une chose paraît étrange,

translation.en: -I don't know this shit. -How about Sherlock Holmes?
translation.fr:
- J'y connais rien.
- Et Sherlock Holmes ?

translation.en: The point is, there's an explanation for everything.
translation.fr: Il y a une explication à tout.

translation.en: What does that have to do with the Arthur Conan Boyle dude?
translation.fr:
Quel est le rapport
avec Arthur Conan Boyle ?

translation.en: [Luke] What the fuck is going on?
I mean, there's only so many options.
translation.fr: Il doit y avoir une explication.

translation.en: Like, someone built an exact replica of our town
translation.fr:
Quelqu'un a construit
une reproduction de notre ville

translation.en: and just put in the middle of nowhere, and if we just walk...
translation.fr:
et nous a lâchés au milieu de nulle part
et si on marche...

translation.en: like, this way or that way or any way,
eventually we'll get back to the...
I'm not saying it makes any sense.
translation.fr: Je ne dis pas que c'est logique.

translation.en: and it came back, and the buses came for us.
translation.fr:
Elle est revenue,
les bus sont venus nous chercher.

translation.en: You're gonna just work this out, Cassandra?
I mean, not a flicker of a doubt?
The world doesn't just turn upside down without a reason.
translation.fr:
Le monde ne se retrouve pas chamboulé
sans raison.
On n'est pas dans une pièce de théâtre.

translation.en: Okay? Clever is not the same thing as true.
translation.fr: Malin, ça veut pas dire vrai.

translation.en: There is a point to everything, there are answers.
translation.fr:
Il y a une explication à tout,
des réponses.

translation.en: God doesn't just play games with people for fun.
translation.fr:
Dieu ne joue pas avec les gens
pour s'amuser.

translation.en: All right, look, Grizz and I will get a group together
translation.fr: Grizz et moi, on formera un groupe

translation.en: and we'll go hike out here through the woods, okay? Like a search party.
translation.fr:
et on traversera la forêt.
On ira en repérage.

translation.en: I think that's a good idea.

translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Il sait ce qu'il fait.

translation.en: And if there's people out there, we gotta find 'em, right?
translation.fr: S'il y a des gens, il faut les trouver.

translation.en: Yeah, I got a house with a refrigerator with food inside of it,
translation.fr: Oui, il y a un frigo rempli chez moi,

translation.en: and I'm gonna go eat it.

translation.fr:
- Luke.
- Tu ne peux pas partir.

translation.en: Well, what are we supposed to do instead?
We have to figure out what is happening to us.
translation.fr: Il faut découvrir ce qui nous arrive.

translation.en: You're not student council president anymore.
translation.fr:
T'es plus présidente
du conseil des élèves.

translation.en: God, you really, really need to get over that.
translation.fr: Faut vraiment que t'arrêtes avec ça !

translation.en: Jesus Christ, just get in the car.
-Hey, what are you doing? -[car engine starts]
-I'm just gonna send a text. -[shutter clicks]
translation.fr:
J'envoie un texto
pour prévenir qu'on est foutus.

translation.en: -Let everybody know how fucked we are. -Campbell!
translation.fr:
J'envoie un texto
pour prévenir qu'on est foutus. Campbell !

translation.en: Come on, let's think about this.
[woman] Hi, you've reached the office of Amanda Pressman.
At the sound of the tone, please--
[man] Hi, you've reached Jim Pressman's phone. Sorry I can't answer your--
translation.fr:
Vous avez appelé Jim Pressman.
Désolé de ne pas...

translation.en: [Amanda] You've reached the Pressman residence. Please leave a message after the--
translation.fr:
Vous avez appelé les Pressman.
Laissez un message après...

translation.en: I just needed to talk to someone.
You're really not talking to me?
What I did is not the worst crime in the world,
and given everything, can't I get a tiny break?
translation.fr:
et vu ce qui se passe,
tu pourrais me pardonner.

translation.en: [girl] Are you serious? Can I have a bag? No, you can't.
-But there's none left, Elle. -That's not my problem.
translation.fr:
- Il n'y en a plus.
- C'est pas mon problème.

translation.en: You ever see that movie The Poseidon Adventure?
It's about a cruise ship and it capsizes,
translation.fr: C'est sur un navire qui se retourne.

translation.en: and the captain, he comes into this big, upside-down ballroom,
translation.fr:
Le capitaine vient dans la salle de bal
et dit à tout le monde de rester là.

translation.en: he tells everybody to stay where they are, that they're gonna be rescued.
translation.fr:
Le capitaine vient dans la salle de bal
et dit à tout le monde de rester là. Car on viendra les secourir.

translation.en: And-- And six of them, they decide to climb up, to the bottom of the ship.
translation.fr:
Mais six passagers décident de remonter
jusqu'à la coque du navire.

translation.en: And ever since I watched it, I always wondered...
translation.fr:
Depuis que j'ai vu ce film,
je me demande...

translation.en: You know, like, who am I in this story? Am I the one who has to...
translation.fr: Qui suis-je dans cette histoire ? Est-ce que je dois...

translation.en: you know, die so that everyone else lives?
Am I the one who turns out weaker than expected?
translation.fr: Suis-je plus faible que je pensais ?

translation.en: Am I the one who's only doing the best when the going is good?
translation.fr:
Est-ce que je fais vraiment
ce qu'il faut ?

translation.en: I know I'm not the heroine.
I'm telling you, the one that you are right now...
translation.fr: La personne que tu es en ce moment...

translation.en: you don't want to be that one.
Do you have, like, a drug problem or something?
Depends on what you mean by that.
Can you take me home? I have to go home.
translation.fr:
Tu peux me ramener ?
Je dois rentrer.

translation.en: Cassandra, what's... What's going on right now?
I ditched my check-up for this trip.
translation.fr:
J'ai zappé mon contrôle médical
pour faire ce voyage.

translation.en: I don't know where I put my pills.
-I'm gonna fucking die. -Come on, don't say that.
translation.fr:
- Je vais mourir.
- Ne dis pas ça.

translation.en: We'll break into the pharmacy, even if we have to blow it up.
translation.fr:
On forcera la porte de la pharmacie
s'il le faut.

translation.en: What if things don't go back to the way they were?
translation.fr: Et si rien ne redevenait comme avant ?

translation.en: -'Course they're gonna go back the way-- -Don't give me a fucking speech, Gordie.
translation.fr:
- Mais si...
- Ne dis pas ça, Gordie.

translation.en: Look, okay, if it turns out we're stuck here,
translation.fr: Si on se retrouve coincés ici...

translation.en: If we can't go back home, if this is our new home, then...
translation.fr:
si on ne peut pas rentrer,
si c'est chez nous...

translation.en: then I'll learn how to take care of you.
I can study. There's still a hospital.
translation.fr: J'étudierai. Il y a un hôpital.

translation.en: You have to stay alive, or else we're all fucked.
translation.fr: Si tu meurs, on est foutus.

translation.en: [Grizz] Okay, so five days' worth of food,
translation.fr: On a cinq jours de nourriture,

translation.en: and that should be enough to get us past Greenwich, Stamford,
translation.fr:
ça devrait suffire
pour atteindre Greenwich, Stamford

translation.en: and all the way up to New Haven.
-I don't understand. -[Harry] It was my mother's.
translation.fr: J'y comprends rien. C'était à ma mère.

translation.en: -I need to go. -[stammers] She was fucking someone.
translation.fr:
- J'y vais.
- Elle se tapait quelqu'un.

translation.en: My dad hasn't even been dead six months.
translation.fr: Mon père est mort il y a six mois.

translation.en: But what does that matter now?
How is finding some shit about our parents going to make things better?
translation.fr:
Ça ne va rien régler,
de trouver des trucs sur nos parents.

translation.en: It was an insurance policy that my father left for me and my sister,
translation.fr:
Mon père nous a laissé ça,
à moi et ma sœur,

translation.en: in case things go to shit.

translation.fr: On ne peut se fier à personne.

translation.en: All you can do is have an advantage and this is mine,
this is the only one that I have. Okay?
translation.fr: C'est le seul ce que j'ai, d'accord ?

translation.en: We don't own each other, remember?
Why should I trust you today,
if I couldn't trust you yesterday?
translation.fr: alors que je ne pouvais pas hier ?

translation.en: You have to stick with your own.
translation.fr: Il faut rester avec les siens.

translation.en: It's just a chunk of metal, Harry.
I don't think that's gonna matter now.
-Thank you. -[girl] Who's got the peanut butter?
-Is it still in the pack? -I'll get it.
translation.fr:
- Il est dans le sac ?
- J'y vais.

translation.en: -What the fuck? Fuck! -[girl] What just happened?
-[Emily] Fucking bit me! -[Grizz] Hey, clear the area.
translation.fr:
- Ça va ?
- Il m'a mordue. Faites de la place. Il faut l'allonger.

translation.en: -Would you lie her down? Careful. -[Emily] Shit, shit, shit, shit! Ow!
translation.fr:
Faites de la place. Il faut l'allonger. - Merde !
- Attention.

translation.en: -[Grizz] All right, just lie her down. -Yeah.
Fucking shit, it hurts so much!
Let's try-- Hey, I'm gonna try to calm you down. All right?
translation.fr: Je vais essayer de te calmer.

translation.en: You wanna slow your heart rate down. So, deep breaths.
translation.fr:
Ralentis ton rythme cardiaque.
Respire à fond.

translation.en: That's good, okay. So, squeeze my hand.
translation.fr: C'est bien, voilà. Serre-moi la main.

translation.en: Big squeeze. Think we can get some packs?
Put it beneath the back of her head, we want her heart above it.
translation.fr:
Derrière la tête,
pour que le cœur soit plus haut.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's a good-- that's a good bite.
-Okay. -Is it supposed to hurt this much? -[Luke] Only if you're lucky. -[Emily chuckles]
translation.fr:
- Ça fait aussi mal d'habitude ?
- Si t'as de la chance.

translation.en: [Luke] Don't worry, Grizz knows what he's doing, all right?
translation.fr: T'inquiète, Grizz sait ce qu'il fait.

translation.en: -Okay, let it out. -[Luke] It's gonna be a badass scar.
translation.fr:
- Ça va te faire une cicatrice.
- Lâche-toi.

translation.en: Everybody else all right? You guys good?
translation.fr: Tout le monde ? Vous allez bien ?

translation.en: If you pick up, I'll explain.
So you're not afraid I'm alive.
translation.fr: N'aie pas peur, je suis en vie.

translation.en: We just want to be with you at home.
translation.fr: On veut rentrer à la maison avec toi.

translation.en: You know how you said everyone we go to school with is an asshole?
translation.fr:
Tu disais que tous les gens du lycée
étaient des cons.
Je ne me sens pas bien.

translation.en: Well, nobody is feeling well, Cassandra.
I'm serious. I can't find my medicine.
translation.fr: Je ne trouve pas mon médicament.

translation.en: Your medicine's-- Your medicine's in my bag.
translation.fr: Ton médicament est dans mon sac.

translation.en: Yeah, I took it for you. I thought maybe you'd forgotten it.
translation.fr: Je l'ai pris. Tu l'avais oublié.

translation.en: [Allie] Yeah. Yeah, I'll get it for you.
But then you need to get out there and you need to do something,
translation.fr:
Après ça,
faut que tu fasses quelque chose.

translation.en: because there's like a hundred scared-shitless idiots running around.
translation.fr:
Ces imbéciles ont peur
et font n'importe quoi.

translation.en: -No one wants to hear anything from me. -Fuck that, Cassandra, you're here.
translation.fr: Personne ne m'écoute. N'importe quoi, t'es là !

translation.en: -Me, too. -And I have to take care of myself.
translation.fr:
- Moi aussi.
- Je dois me soigner.

translation.en: And I need you take care of me.
I live in your shadow for 17 fucking years...
translation.fr: J'ai vécu 17 ans dans ton ombre.

translation.en: and now you want to disappear?
Just go get my medicine, Allie.
Glasberg tried to barbecue in his own room and...
translation.fr:
Glasberg a essayé de faire un barbecue
dans sa chambre
et a mis le feu à sa maison.

translation.en: I'd have voted him most likely to do that.
translation.fr: Ça ne m'étonne pas de sa part.

translation.en: I don't know where I'm going.

translation.fr: On a nulle part où aller.

translation.en: break into a restaurant and steal some food and hang out.
translation.fr:
entrer dans un resto,
voler de la bouffe et discuter.

translation.en: Look, I just want to help.

translation.fr: Je sais ce que tu veux.

translation.en: So what? That's what I want.
Since the day I moved here.
It's not a very good time. In case you haven't noticed,
translation.fr:
C'est pas le moment.
T'as pas remarqué que le monde est foutu ?

translation.en: -the whole world just turned upside down. -I noticed, okay? Believe me.
translation.fr:
C'est pas le moment.
T'as pas remarqué que le monde est foutu ? Si, j'ai remarqué.

translation.en: Today feels like the first day in my whole life
translation.fr: Pour une fois, dans ma vie,

translation.en: Now what does he have that I don't have?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il a de plus que moi ?

translation.en: We're in Connecticut, man. What the fuck? There's no fucking cobras here.
translation.fr: On est dans le Connecticut. Il n'y a pas de cobra ici.

translation.en: But we're three hours from anywhere.
translation.fr: On est à trois heures de tout.

translation.en: And I have no idea what to...
Fuck. What-- What the fuck does that mean?
Her body's shutting down, she's suffocating.
What... I made her do it, dude.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Je l'ai forcée à venir.

translation.en: You should tell everybody so they're prepared.
What the fuck does that mean? Are you giving up, Grizz?
translation.fr: Comment ça ? On baisse les bras ?

translation.en: Luke, we're so fucking in over our heads here. Jesus fucking Christ, man.
translation.fr:
- On ne peut rien faire.
- Bordel de merde !

translation.en: H-hey, I don't think she's breathing.
-I don't think she's-- -Give her mouth-to-mouth, just--
-I don't know how to-- Okay! -Just do it, just blow!

translation.fr:
- Penche sa tête.
- Quoi ? - La tête en arrière.
- Bouche son nez.

translation.en: -You have to tilt her head back. -[boy] Block her nose.
translation.fr:
- La tête en arrière.
- Bouche son nez.

translation.en: -Put your fingers over her nose! -Look, I'm doing the best I can!
translation.fr: Couvre son nez ! Je fais ce que je peux !

- Tu sens son pouls ?
- Je crois pas.

translation.en: -[boy] I don't know. I don't think so. -[girl] That's not how you do it. Shit.
translation.fr:
- Tu sens son pouls ?
- Je crois pas. C'est pas comme ça. Merde.

translation.en: No, you can't do that while I'm doing this! It's not gonna work!
translation.fr:
Ne fais pas ça en même temps. - Ça marchera pas.
- Arrête.

- Ça marchera pas.
- Arrête. - Tu m'as dit...
- Je te dis d'arrêter.

translation.en: And now I'm telling you not to, okay?!
translation.fr:
- Tu m'as dit...
- Je te dis d'arrêter.

translation.en: Come on, Emily, stay with us. Come on!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
We need to decide whether to bury her here or take her home.
translation.fr:
Faut décider si on l'enterre ici
ou si on la ramène.

translation.en: The rest is out of our hands.
translation.fr: On ne peut plus rien faire.

translation.en: No, no, no. Fuck that. No, we can do this. Come on.
translation.fr: Non, putain. On va y arriver. Allez.

translation.en: I want to know why we're here.
translation.fr: Je veux comprendre ce qu'on fait là.

translation.en: And why this place is exactly like home?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi cet endroit ressemble
à chez nous ?

translation.en: And the lights still go on?
[laughs] And our cell phones still work.
[in sign language] What if there is no why?

translation.fr: Ou libérés ou je ne sais quoi.

translation.en: I mean, there's a story here.

translation.fr: On ne disparaît pas comme ça.

translation.en: Apparently they do. You go missing, you go deaf for no reason.
translation.fr: On dirait que si. On disparaît. On devient sourd. Sans raison.

translation.en: You're looking for answers.There are none.
translation.fr: Tu cherches des réponses. Il n'y en a pas.

translation.en: You know what? Something happened yesterday.
translation.fr: Il s'est passé quelque chose hier.

translation.en: I have to find out why.
-[Grizz] Need me to take her for a while? -[Luke] No, I'm all right.
translation.fr: Tu veux que je la porte ? Non, ça va.

translation.en: the writing on the wall from before we left.
'Cause that's exactly how God would do it.
translation.fr: C'est exactement ce que ferait Dieu.

translation.en: I just got a bar of reception.
Just tell her to spread the word,
translation.fr: Dis-lui de prévenir tout le monde.

translation.en: and have everybody meet at the church.
They must be headed back here. That's why he wanted us together.
translation.fr:
Ils doivent revenir.
C'est pour ça qu'ils nous ont rassemblés.

translation.en: Twelve hours. Maybe they found something.
translation.fr: Douze heures. Ils ont dû trouver un truc.

translation.en: Or maybe they found nothing. Why wouldn't he say if it was good news?
translation.fr:
Ou rien. Ils l'auraient dit
si c'était une bonne nouvelle.

translation.en: there are some things that we ought to figure out.
translation.fr: il y a des choses à régler.

translation.en: Before we rip this place apart and maybe...
you know, start hurting each other.
translation.fr: et qu'on se fasse du mal.

translation.en: I don't know what the hell is going on.
Maybe Luke will come back with some good news.
translation.fr: Luke a peut-être de bonnes nouvelles.

translation.en: Yeah, why don't we just wait and see, Cassandra?
translation.fr: Si on attendait de voir, plutôt ?

translation.en: Because I would rather prepare for the worst before the worst happens.
translation.fr:
Je préfère me préparer au pire
avant que le pire n'arrive.

translation.en: I don't know specifically, but I think it means...
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas au juste,
mais on pourrait...

translation.en: we agree not to just take things
translation.fr: se mettre d'accord de ne pas prendre...

translation.en: Until all the food is gone and...
translation.fr: Une fois que la nourriture aura disparu...

translation.en: Jesus, man, what is your problem?
What are we agreeing to, Cassandra?
Which one of us gets to decide who gets what?
translation.fr: Qui va décider qui prend quoi ?

translation.en: How do you want to decide things?
Every person for themselves? Then we're back to where we started.
translation.fr:
Chacun pour soi ?
On revient à la case départ.

translation.en: Maybe you want to flip a coin to see who decides?
translation.fr: Tu veux décider à pile ou face ?
Si on se fiait à la chance.

translation.en: -I'm-- I'm not gonna do that. -Okay, okay.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas faire ça.

translation.en: There's no civilization here, not until we start one.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a pas de civilisation,
on doit en démarrer une.

translation.en: So what are we gonna do?
First, I think we have no choice but to share.
translation.fr:
D'abord, on n'a pas le choix,
il faut partager...

translation.en: Really? How much electricity do we have?
Until it's all used up and everything goes dark?
I think 225 people in 200 houses doesn't make sense.
translation.fr:
Avoir 225 personnes dans 200 maisons,
c'est ridicule.
On garde ce qui est à nous.

translation.en: [Cassandra] What is yours? Do you have money?
The things that you need to live:
food, clothes, the stuff in stores,
translation.fr:
la nourriture, les habits,
les trucs dans les magasins.

translation.en: Are we going to fight each other over food?
translation.fr: On va se battre pour la nourriture ?

translation.en: And some of us have things that others want.
translation.fr:
Certains ont des trucs
que d'autres veulent.

translation.en: Right, Harry. I have no house.
translation.fr: C'est vrai, j'ai pas de maison.

translation.en: The place that I used to live in is outside of town, it doesn't exist.
translation.fr:
L'endroit où j'habitais
se trouve en-dehors de la ville.

translation.en: You want me to just live on the streets?
translation.fr: Je dois vivre dans la rue ?

translation.en: You can live wherever you want.
I don't have to listen to this. Not anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas écouter ça.

translation.en: Harry, this has nothing to do with you--
No one elected you king, cousin.
translation.fr: Personne ne t'a élue reine, Cousine.

translation.en: Did anybody vote for her? Did they?
translation.fr: Qui a voté pour elle ? Vous ?

translation.en: Anybody elect her to speak on your behalf?
translation.fr:
Vous l'avez élue
pour parler en votre nom ?

translation.en: I don't want to be king.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être reine.

translation.en: That's not what it looks like.
I've thought a lot about dying.
translation.fr: Je pense beaucoup à la mort.

translation.en: I've almost gotten used to that.
But I don't like to be afraid.
translation.fr: Mais je n'aime pas avoir peur.

translation.en: I don't want to shoot you.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas te tuer.

translation.en: We'll be back when Luke gets here.
translation.fr: On reviendra quand Luke sera là.

translation.en: Until then, if anybody else is tired of listening to her,
translation.fr:
En attendant,
si vous en avez marre de l'écouter,

translation.en: She died from a snake bite.
translation.fr: Une morsure de serpent l'a tuée.

translation.en: Her whole body just shut down.
We did everything we could, but we couldn't save her.
translation.fr: On a fait notre possible pour la sauver.

translation.en: So we're gonna bury her tomorrow.

translation.fr: Avant que ça commence à sentir.

translation.en: [Grizz] So, I'm gonna need a couple of guys.

translation.fr: Il n'y a rien en dehors de la ville.

translation.en: just woods that go on forever.
[in sign language] It's my house, too.
I never had just one day that was mine, until now.
translation.fr:
je n'ai jamais une journée rien qu'à moi,
jusqu'à aujourd'hui.

translation.en: All right, give me the key,
[whispers] Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
translation.fr:
Quand je marche
dans la vallée de l'ombre de la mort,

translation.en: I will fear no evil for thou art with me.
translation.fr:
je ne crains aucun mal,
car tu es avec moi.

translation.en: Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me. My cup runneth over.
translation.fr: Ta houlette et ton bâton me rassurent.
Je ne me sens pas bien.
